price: 21. To boye topesaki bango buku liboso mpo basimbama na yango?
arabic: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: am ātaynāhum kitāban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikūna
